title: Alimens & Gentle Men's Dress Shirts Long Sleeve Wrinkle-Free Stretch Shirts Solid Formal Button Down Shirt with Pocket
description: Flex fabric:The long sleeve dress shirt is made of high-quality stretch fabric, makes you move body easier; soft and comfortable with good breathability, wrinkle-free and not easy to deform
Design:The men's business shirt features spread collar, long sleeves, button closure, adjustable cuff, provide you fashion looking

Occasion:The classic dress shirt is perfect for formal occasions or daily casual, such as: business, work, office, wedding, party, prom, concert, nightclub, concert, date, casual and so on; it is also an ideal gift for family, lovers, friends, colleagues, father Day ,valentine's day, christmas

Match:This button down shirts are the perfect combination of classic elegance and modern chic, easy to match. The top button can be opened for a relaxed and casual everyday atmosphere, or a tie or bow tie can be worn for the perfect business style
Easy Care:Hand wash or machine wash cold; please do not bleach, tumble dry low; low iron if necessary
